analytic.title: Courteous Reader, pardon I pray smaller faults escaped in prin∣ting, and amend these greater as following.

monogr.title: The saints societie : Delivered in XIV. sermons, by I.B. Master in arts, and preacher of Gods word at Broughton in Northampton Shire
monogr.author: Bentham, Joseph

div.head: Courteous Reader, pardon I pray smaller faults escaped in printing, and amend these greater as following.
div.p: Page 13. line 5. for comsorts, reade consorts. p. 21. l. 1. correcting, 1. converting p. 31. l. 28. openly, r. onely. p. 38. l. 19. of, r. as. p. 49. l. 28. leading, r. loading. p. 64. l. 33. stayng, r. staining. p. 70. l. 16. alike, r. alive. p. 80. l. 12. it, r. in. P. 100. l. 4. where, r. whence. Ibid. l. 5. Bubus, r Subus. p 108. l 33. money, r. many. p. 178. l. 19. feele, r. seeke p. 183 l 17. Iudaicall, r. iudiciall. p. 227. l. 17. we and all, r. woe and alas, p. 245 coniunction, r. conviction. p. 225. l. 33 dissoluble, r. indissoluble.
